fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Each night, attack a player.
> After you get one kill with this, you may target a player; deploy brambles at there house, attacking all there visitors each night.(1 use)
> After you get 3 kills with that ability, your ability will function as if brambles were on the targets         neighbors.
> After you get 4 kills on your targetâ€™s neighbors, you gain the ability wall of trees; you may place trees on any player, killing them, all their visitors, cleaning them, learning their roles. None of these players will appear as dead.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your attacks will seek to a player who visited your target if anybody visited them.
- You may not spawn with Monkey(Magic)
